| HistoryText             = The Goblinettes were a trio of feminine [[Green Goblin]] robots created by [[Harold Osborn (Earth-616)|Harry Osborn]] to force his son, [[Norman Harold Osborn (Earth-616)|Normie]], to become the new Green Goblin following his death. [[Harold & Norman Osborn (A.I.) (Earth-616)|An A.I.]] amalgamated from copies of Harry and [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman]]'s minds deployed the robots to capture Normie and exact Harry's posthumous plan. However, the plan was ultimately thwarted by the combined efforts of [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], [[Mark Raxton (Earth-616)|Molten Man]], and [[Benjamin Urich (Earth-616)|Ben Urich]]. The robots were destroyed in the process.{{r|Spider-Man: Legacy of Evil Vol 1 1}}
